title: Gold Hits Record Highs: What Experts Say About Its Correlation with Bitcoin
summary: As gold hits record highs, experts are debating if Bitcoin will rise or fall. Both are seen as key hedges in the changing economy. Stay tuned for more insights

body.raw:
![Gold Hits Record Highs: What Experts Say About Its Correlation with Bitcoin](https://beincrypto.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/BIC_Tokenization_bitcoin-covers_coins.png)

As gold hits record highs, experts are debating if Bitcoin will rise or fall. Both are seen as key hedges in the changing economy. Stay tuned for more insights on the correlation between these two assets.
